verses.verse: I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, that, <S%G4412>first<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G1162>supplications<s%>, <S%G4335>prayers<s%>, <S%G1783>intercessions<s%>, and giving of <S%G2169>thanks<s%>, be <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>; exhort: or, desire

<S%G5228>For<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5247>authority<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G1236>lead<s%> a <S%G2263>quiet<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2272>peaceable<s%> <S%G979>life<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4587>honesty<s%>. authority: or, eminent place

<S%G3739>Who<s%> will <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to be <S%G4982>saved<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>.
<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> a <S%G487>ransom<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, to be <S%G3142>testified<s%> in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>. to: or, a testimony

<S%G1519>Whereunto<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G5087>ordained<s%> a <S%G2783>preacher<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%>, (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, and <S%G5574>lie<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>;) a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G225>verity<s%>.

In like <S%G5615>manner<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, that <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2885>adorn<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2887>modest<s%> <S%G2689>apparel<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G127>shamefacedness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4997>sobriety<s%>; <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> broided <S%G4117>hair<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3135>pearls<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4185>costly<s%> <S%G2441>array<s%>; broided: or, plaited

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G2010>suffer<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> to usurp <S%G831>authority<s%> over the <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2271>silence<s%>.
